thread.title: Inside Photos: Bipasha Basu Threw Karan Singh Grover The Most Epic Birthday Party | MissMalini
thread.title_full: Inside Photos: Bipasha Basu Threw Karan Singh Grover The Most Epic Birthday Party | MissMalini

title: Inside Photos: Bipasha Basu Threw Karan Singh Grover The Most Epic Birthday Party | MissMalini
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 23 . 2017 
Karan Singh Grover just turned a year older and his darling wife Bipasha Basu threw him the most epic birthday party. As you can see from his Instagram posts, it was a surprise and he was left completely speechless! Here are some inside photos. A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Feb 21, 2017 at 12:17pm PST A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:52am PST A post shared by karan singh grover (@iamksgofficial) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:53am PST A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:48pm PST A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Feb 22, 2017 at 2:12pm PST A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Feb 22, 2017 at 2:21pm PST A post shared by Vijayeta Basu (@vi_basu) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:13pm PST A post shared by Vijayeta Basu (@vi_basu) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:18pm PST A post shared by Vijayeta Basu (@vi_basu) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:04am PST 
Awww. We love their ‘monkey love!’ Happy Birthday, KSG! <3 0
